title: Mono comp graph shows SR, not LR, equilibrium

content.description: The QuestionÂ refers to the following graph, which shows the cost and revenue curves for a profit-maximizing monopolistically competitive firm.
content.question: Is the firm in short-run or long-run equilibrium?

choices.label: Short run, because price is greater than marginal cost
Short run, because the firm is earning a positive economic profit
Long run, because price is greater than average total cost
Long run, because marginal revenue is not equal to zero
Either short run or long run, because the firm is producing where marginal revenue equals marginal cost

content.answer: Short run, because the firm is earning a positive economic profit

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
